content: this is a summary of a legal case in slovenia where the supreme court made a decision on june 21 2018 the case involves two parties but the details are not provided in the first instance the plaintiff was ordered to pay the costs and in the supreme court the defendants costs were determined to be 446276 eur which the plaintiff must pay the case involves the division of ownership of a real estate property specifically an apartment with a 50 division between the plaintiff and the defendant the supreme court dismissed the application for revision the case also involves a marriage and the division of property with specific laws used in the decision the court decision states that coowned property includes assets acquired during the marriage and the remaining value is divided in the event of a divorce the court dismissed the application for revision and ordered the plaintiff to reimburse the defendants defense costs the case also involves the ownership of several real estate properties with specific purchase prices determined the court declared the applicant as the owner of 15 of the property and the defendant as the owner of 45 of the property the court ordered the defendant to pay a specific amount of money including default interest the court dismissed an application for the declaration of common property and awarded higher rental and purchase payments the applicant was ordered to pay the defendants legal costs the court of second instance rejected the appeal and upheld the decision of the court of first instance the applicant is requesting a revision of the judgment claiming procedural breaches and errors in the law the court appeal made by the defendant was reviewed and their claim for a higher share of community property was justified the court dismissed the appeal and upheld the previous judgment the court rejected an appeal and ordered the applicant to reimburse the defendant for the costs incurred the court reviewed the costs of the proceedings and awarded the defendant a total of 446276 eur the judgment also discusses the division of assets in a divorce and the application of foreign law

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Vrhovnega sodišča RS II Ips 296/2016, 21. 6. 2018
